Announcements:
<color=lightblue>August 8th, 2025 - Welcome to our Alpha Demo!</color>

This demo is a taste of what is to come, and while we'd love to reveal everything to you already, we did pack in as much as we could without giving away too much either.

Mess with and break the game! There's a good lot to discover in this demo. All of us have been pretty addicted to Stabjack, so we hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

Also, <link="Steam"><color=lightblue><u>Wishlisting</u></color></link> us on Steam is very meaningful and helps us a ton!
For any feedback and our community, we have a <link="Discord"><color=lightblue><u>Discord</u></color></link> too, come join in!

- Arthur Yurov, Game Director
Changelog: August 29th, 2025 - v0.37.12 Features - Reworked animation system, with improvements across the board and new animations Balance Fake/Sap effects are now handled prior to incoming damage from Burning and Bleeding (when Bleeding takes effect at start of turn instead of end) - Changed Gun Holster to be Exotic Grade instead of Rare - Added 2 new Rare items Quality of Life - Added clarity to Modify Card events, showing "Choose up to X cards" and having the selected amount shown visually on the Confirm button - Added text to top right menu buttons - Added Play/Skip Story popup selection when starting a new run in place of the Skip Story checkbox - Added Skip Story setting to options and Map (automatically enabled/disabled with new run popup) - Clarified Merge Cards event dialogue - Clarified and added to all dialogue, having last dialogue have enough useful info for the player to know what they are doing next if they skipped it - Starting a run from the Tutorial now has its own button instead of the Play Tutorial checkbox - Added Skip Cinematic button to most capable cinematics when a profile exists (not first playthrough) - Added icon of Jack to current location on the map Fixes - Fixed various Dialogue and text sequences - Fixed multiple button click sounds playing when skipping dialogue - Fixed continue button not playing sound effect - Fixed not being able to click through the Saving Logo if something is behind it August 14th, 2025 - v0.37.11 - Fixed Royal Crown not properly applying to cards in certain situations - Fixed items that added to Card Value without adding to Card Total not applying for Suit-based card modifiers - Adjusted some icons for clarity - Fixed some dialogue August 8th, 2025 - v0.37.10 - Fixed Sharp cards breaking when dragging them improperly - Fixed summoned enemies sometimes spawning with incorrect healh August 8th, 2025 - v0.37.9 - Initial public Alpha release
